Reserve your spot in the Cat Lounge

To ensure a delightful experience for you and our feline friends, we encourage guests to secure their spot by making per-person reservations in advance. With a limited number of spaces available per session, reservations guarantee your entry and help us maintain the ideal human-to-kitty ratio for maximum enjoyment.
Thank you for choosing to share your time with us and our adorable cats. We look forward to creating lasting memories with you at Cali Co. Cat Cafe!


Learn more about entry

Step 1. Tell us about your visit

Help us create a perfect experience for you! Please provide some more details about your group in the reservation process to help us narrow down the best available times, creating a personalized visit just for you.
